mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.pic, u.created_at, u.uid, u.nick_name , COUNT(DISTINCT f.feed_id) AS feedCount , COUNT(DISTINCT f.feed_id, fl.user_id) AS allFeedLikeCount , COUNT(DISTINCT fwer.from_user_id) AS followerCount , COUNT(DISTINCT fwing.to_user_id) AS followingCount , MAX(IF(fwer.from_user_id = #{signedUserId}, 1, 0)) + MAX(IF(fwing.to_user_id = #{signedUserId}, 2, 0)) AS followState FROM user u LEFT JOIN feed f ON f.writer_user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN feed_like fl ON fl.feed_id = f.feed_id LEFT JOIN user_follow fwer ON fwer.to_user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN user_follow fwing ON fwing.from_user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{profileUserId}
